{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02325v1", "title": "Surgeries between lens spaces of type $L(n,1)$ and the Heegaard Floer
  $d$-invariant", "summary": "We establish a $d$-invariant surgery formula for $L$-space knots that
provides an effective tool for studying surgeries between lens spaces. Using
this formula, we classify distance one surgeries between lens spaces of the
form $L(n,1)$. This classification has direct applications to band surgeries
between torus links $T(2,n)$, with connections to DNA topology. In particular,
we show that chirally cosmetic banding of torus links can possibly occur only
when $n=1,5,9$ or $10$.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT", "published": "2025-04-03T06:56:26Z"}
